headline.main: CHINA SEES JAPAN ON THE DEFENSIVE; But Tsiang, the Spokesman, Warns That Defeat Will Take 'Long Stretch of Time' DOUBTS INVASION OF INDIA Predicts Own Offensive and Pacific Attacks Will Prevent Foe From Starting Drive

lead_paragraph: CHUNGKING, China, Sept. 1 -- "The rising sun of Japan has already passed the noon hour and Japan has now moved from the offensive to the defensive stage," declared the government spokesman, Dr. T.F. Tsiang, today.
abstract: Dr T F Tsiang sees Japan on defensive and Allies stronger warns of long war
snippet: CHUNGKING, China, Sept. 1 -- "The rising sun of Japan has already passed the noon hour and Japan has now moved from the offensive to the defensive stage," declared the government spokesman, Dr. T.F. Tsiang, today....

byline.original: Wireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES
